speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Welcome to the SPOT Agency, my name is Captain Storm.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Recently, a team of scientists and researchers found a way to travel into the future!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: But now they need volunteers to go on a mission to the year 2075 to see what the future is like.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: They are specifically interested in the type of technology that will be available.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: We can solve future problems from the past! Pretty cool, right? But it's very top secret! Let me tell you your secret mission.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Your mission is to go into the future, explore any technologies you find, spot any problems the technologies may have and solve those problems.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: You will bring back information that will help you design technologies that are good for your community.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: So glad you are now a part of our team! Now our agents will get you started and set up in the SPOT system.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Agent Fern is our brilliant physicist who developed a way to time travel!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Agent Gear is our engineer who designed and built special SPOT robots!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Agent Spark is our software developer. She writes the code for all our SPOT tech!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Hello! Great to meet you Agent...

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Oops, you don't have a secret agent name yet! That's so important!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Your agent name should be something that inspires you! Mine is Agent Spark because I love electronic gadgets.

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Agent Fern is inspired by plants and things that grow.

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Agent Gear is inspired by motorcycles!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: What inspired you? I'm sure you will choose a great secret agent name!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Here is your SPOT tablet. You will use this to keep track of your mission to the future. Let's get yours set up!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Thank you Agent Spark! It looks like our new agent-in-training is ready to go to the lab!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: This is the lab! Agent Fern will help you.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: But, before you start your training, you will need a...

speaker: Agent Fern
dialog: A Bot Buddy!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Yes, thank you Agent Fern! A Bot Buddy!

speaker: Agent Fern
dialog: Great to see you, Captain Storm! Welcome, [AGENT NAME]! I can't wait to tell you about Bot Buddy!

speaker: Agent Fern
dialog: Your Bot Buddy will be your companion during this mission. Bot Buddies can provide clues and receive directions form Mission Control.

speaker: Agent Fern
dialog: It will be super useful in your mission to the future!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Agent Fern... where are the Bot Buddies?

speaker: Agent Fern
dialog: I don't know!!

speaker: Agent Gear
dialog: I have them, Captain Storm! Sorry I was late, I wanted our new agent to have all the options to choose from!

speaker: Agent Gear
dialog: [AGENT NAME], please choose the Bot Buddy you want to accompany you on your mission to the future.

speaker: Agent Gear
dialog: All of the Bot Buddies have the same abilities so you can choose the one tou like best!

*CRASH* 
*BANG*

speaker: Bot Buddy
dialog: Hello! I will be your Bot Buddy!

speaker: Agent Gear
dialog: Nailed it!!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Excellent! Thank you Agent Gear and Agent Fern!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Mission Control needs you to complete some training before going on the mission.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: This training helps us understand what you know about technology and Artificial Intelligence.

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Then, the Tech Team will load your Bot Buddy with additional information and knowledge to help you on your mission.

speaker: SPOT Agents
dialog: You can count on us!

speaker: Captain Storm
dialog: Thanks, team! At the end of this first training, you will receive your first badge! Let's get started!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: This is your SPOT tabled! Used for all official SPOT missions!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Use your Travel Log to share information and send updated to SPOT Mission Control

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: This is the profile button. You can check and edit your profile. You can see the progress of other agents too!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: YOu need to earn badges to move from "Special Agent in Training" to "Advanced Special Agent"

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: The Settings button lets you change the color of your frame! I like mine to be yellow!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Your Time Travel Machine holds 100 megajoules of power, which is exactly the amount it takes to get to the year 2075!

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: To return to present dau, you will need to refuel by gaining 100 megajoules of power while you are in the future

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Complete entries within your Time Travel Log to power up. Mission Control will send you some megajoules of power each time you make an entry.

speaker: Agent Spark
dialog: Now you have all the information on how to use the SPOT tablet!
